content: inspired by this breathtaking natural phenomenon is the aurora borealis easy rectangular shawl as the night sky unfurls its celestial tapestry few spectacles rival the mesmerizing dance of the aurora borealis there s something magical about translating the vibrant hues and undulating waves of the northern lights into a tangible piece of wearable art this crochet pattern is beginner-friendly using basic crochet stitches to create a lovely lacy design as you continue to repeat for 3 the lacy and delicate look comes alive with just one lightweight yarn cake you can make this generous size shawl skill level beginner crocheter you should be able to read a crochet pattern and work double_crochet stitches and chain stitches size finished size 29 inches x 54 inches after blocking to make this in your desired size adjust the length by changing the beginning number of stitches use multiples of 5 + 4 adjust the width by adding or decreasing row materials yarn color number 14 in twirls yarn from cotton kings 1 skein or 874 yards i purchased the yarn for this at hobbii it is a number 2 fine thread yarn weight 5 0 mm crochet hook size h tapestry needle for weaving in the yarn ends scissors for sniping off any excess yarn
